rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall that provides a transitional space into the main building, adhering to Vastu principles by facing the auspicious north-east direction.
Spacious living area designed for relaxation and gatherings, with large windows oriented towards the east to invite natural light.
An open dining area that connects with the kitchen for an integrated experience, following traditional Indian design aesthetics.
Functional and modern kitchen designed to cater to both industrial and residential needs with efficient workflow.
Dedicated workspace for light industrial activities, designed with robust materials and ample ventilation as per local building norms.
Well-equipped bathroom with necessary fixtures to support the overall functionality of the ground floor.
A serene library space designed for reading and study, enriched with natural light from north-facing windows, in line with Vastu recommendations.

openings.description: Main entrance door oriented towards the auspicious north-east direction as per Vastu principles.
Backdoor for service access, balancing the design with local building norms.
Distributed windows to ensure balanced ventilation and adherence to natural light requirements.
